page.title: 04FARMING IN THE AREA.
page.content: The farms in the area are medium sized and are situated in isolated spots. They are fairly profitable farms which are up to date.They pass the farms down to younger people in the family.We will focus on two examples: {JERICHO FARM }Jericho Farm is owned by John Hardy.He employes 2 full time st- aff who work 40 hours in summer and 100 hours in winter.John works 7 days a week sometimes all day othertimes only 3-4 hours.He owns 360 acres of land 110 of which is grass & 250 acres is cereals.John has 3 dogs,54 beef ca- ttle,2 horses,20 hens,5 cats.Also have barren cows which don't produce milk. Have no specialized crops.Also grow 3 tons of grass & barley per acre.Have 1 combined harvester,1 loading digger,1 round & square bailer,1 spraying mach- ine.Jericho farm is typical of the farms in Lambley and Woodborough.
